wikipedia_page.main: Kevin Welsh (born 2 September 1984) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays as a left back.

response: Kevin Welsh is a former a U.S. soccer forward who played five seasons in the North American Soccer League, one in the American Soccer League and at least one in the Major Indoor Soccer League.  He also earned one cap with the U.S. national team.
